title: 急需几个材质包的png名字，注意不是图片！
author: 百里—周哥

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
版本jar\assets\minecraft\textures\blocks

羊毛是wool_colored_颜色

版本jar\assets\minecraft\textures\items 

唱片是 record_唱片名称
颜料是dye_powder_颜色

replies.author: 百里—周哥
replies.txt_content: 偶不，是急求，不是急需- -我曰
